#summary Plugin POM configuration.

== Overview ==

Pom dependency and configuration.

== Details ==

{{{
<plugin>
  <groupId>org.moyrax</groupId>
  <artifactId>qunit-maven-plugin</artifactId>
  <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
   <executions>
    <execution>
      <goals>
        <!-- Goal for executing qunit tests. -->
        <goal>qunit</goal>
      </goals>
    </execution>
  </executions>
  <configuration>
    <!-- This directory and all the subdirectories will be used
         as the "context path" for loading JavaScript sources
         using the *include* directive. -->
    <contextPath>
      <directory>src/main/resources/</directory>
      <excludes>
        <exclude>**/.svn/**</exclude>
      </excludes>
    </contextPath>

    <!-- Scripts which will be executed as qunit tests. -->
    <testResources>
      <directory>src/test/resources/org/moyrax/</directory>
      <includes>
        <include>**/*-test.js</include>
      </includes>
    </testResources>
  </configuration>
</plugin>
}}}
